text:
Arey tumko adesh bolu ya adarshwadi.... roz subah uthna fir nahana fir mandir jaana, itna toh mandir ke pujari bhi nahi karte yaar. Pehli baar jab maine suna ki toh zindagi mai har din nahaya h toh mujhe toh tu ajeeb laga par fir jab train wala kissa suna toh bharosa ho gaya ki tu bhi chutiya hi h

Tu toh apna psuedo bhai h...tera bed mera hi toh h. Anime ki duniya mai haath pakadkar ghuswane ke liye bahut sukriya (aise hi logo ko jabardasti kimi no na wa dikhate rehna...), uske baad toh kaha hi rukna....detective conan...telegu movies....manga partners....aur kya kya cheeze.

Exams ki pehle ki wo raate jab tu chill maarke soo jaata tha aur fir subah uthkar humsab ke saath saraswati vandana sunna karta tha, wo bhi kya din the

Tu aise toh bahut nidarr h, NCC walo se ladd gaye aur bhi aise bahut jagah rahe h jaha tu ladda but yaar tu apne cycle ke liye nahi ladd paaya. Ye mujhe bahut bura laga. ;-(

Aur tu saale kabhi trip pe nahi aata h, humesha kuch na kuch bahana....jaldi se chal le IAS banane ke baad aur time nahi milega...next trip pe mana kiya toh dosti cancel

Chalo baaki yaadon ka kya h wo toh bante rahenge, acche se raho, UPSC nikalo, wing ka naam roshan karo aur kabhi chicken try karna ho toh pata hi h kiske paas aana h....tere roomie ka sudhikaran kar hi diya tha, tera bhi kar dunga.
author: Shubham Sourav (S Kumar)

text:
Raja babu, apse 1st year toh utna bat-cheet hua nahi par fir 2nd year mai hum dono tehre batti wale toh mulakaat toh honi hi thi, par asli ice breaker toh humara summer ka trip hi tha. Tereko mai naa chahte hue scooty partner mil gaya....kaafi mazza aaya tha yaar usme (wo gearge everest jagah hi chutiya tha usme kuch kiya nahi jaa sakta tha).

Fir 3rd year mai toh EE ke courses mai toh milkar hi nayya paar hui h humdono ki (tu kya digital samjhaya tha, mazza hi aa gaya tha). Raghu sahi mai chutiya h par tumne bacha liya usme.

Wo late night baate, tumhari love stories, wo bhi kya din the. Accha hua campus mai atleast akhri 1 mahine toh guzaar paye....baaki tumhari plannings ke kya hi kehne, photoshoot/airstrip dono time pe cover ho gayi.

Ab bas goa chalna h tumhare saath, tum rahoge toh group mai kisi ladki ki aane ka chances bhi badh jayega exponentially.

Aur kya milte h bangalore mai (hopefully mujhe bangalore mil jaaye....haan, ye rr hi h). Bas issi tarah mujhpe kripa banaye rakhna aur bhagwaan bhi tumpe apna krupa banaye rakhenge :-p
author: Shubham Sourav (S Kumar)
